example.content:
IMPORT
show access-list
access-list cached ACL log flows: total 0, denied 0 (deny-flow-max 4096) alert-interval 300 access-list FROM-inside; 6 elements; name hash: 0x9f3faf0b access-list FROM-inside line 1 extended permit ip 10.101.119.0 255.255.255.0 10.101.45.0 255.255.255.0 log informational interval 300 (hitcnt=0) 0x4a19f9aa access-list FROM-inside line 2 extended permit ip 10.101.119.0 255.255.255.0 10.101.200.96 255.255.255.240 log informational interval 300 (hitcnt=0) 0x0ab1a8e4 access-list FROM-inside line 3 extended permit ip 10.101.119.0 255.255.255.0 1.1.1.0 255.255.255.0 log informational interval 300 (hitcnt=0) 0x05a2fa29 access-list FROM-inside line 4 extended permit ip 10.101.119.0 255.255.255.0 10.101.65.0 255.255.255.0 log informational interval 300 (hitcnt=0) 0x33a68220 access-list FROM-inside line 5 extended permit tcp host 1.1.1.1 any eq telnet log informational interval 300 (hitcnt=0) 0x606e131b access-list FROM-inside line 6 extended deny ip any any log informational interval 300 (hitcnt=0) 0xf6e69404 access-list FROM-outside; 2 elements; name hash: 0x8105125f access-list FROM-outside line 1 extended permit tcp any host 1.2.3.4 eq www log informational interval 300 (hitcnt=132) 0xd588ef10 access-list FROM-outside line 2 extended deny ip any any (hitcnt=0) 0x5db271bd
show running-config | include access-group
access-group FROM-outside in interface outside access-group FROM-inside in interface inside

command.name: CREATE
UPDATE
